typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		columns as string[],
		data as string[][]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	limit: 100,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> GetTickers
CreateColumns alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
GetTickers foldDown(unroll(data, data),
	mapColumn(
		data
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenDataArray
FlattenDataArray derive(SimFinID = data[1],
		Ticker = data[2],
		Exchange = 'NASDAQ',
		Active = 0) ~> CreateColumns
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['AzureProjectActiveStock.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		Ticker,
		Exchange,
		Active
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> WriteToControl
